metadata.title: CVE-2016-2347 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Integer underflow in the decode_level3_header function in lib/lha_file_header.c in Lhasa before 0.3.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted archive.

criterions.comment: lhasa package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.1-1').
